name: The forgotten space base
description:
Dear Robot,

Your mission is to reopen the base  PT-45 20 VLMP 17.
Use the two fuel cells from your ship to start the heaters you find.
You will find more fule cells and heaters on the base. 

God Luck!

-------------------------------------

Use WSAD to move around
Jump with Space
Mouse to look around
Use E to start and stop the platforms
Press H to hide and show information

No Gampad support  (next version)
